name: unawarded
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a prize, money, or an advantage) not given : The prize still sits unawarded in the vaults of the bank. Most of these scholarships are unawarded each year because no one applies for them. Related word
award verb
More examplesFewer examplesEach year there are so many acts of bravery that go unawarded.The final seconds of the match saw a blatant but unawarded penalty.The administration is authorized to use the unawarded amount to fund additional women's business centre sites.
